Pre-Game Insights: Richie Berrington won the toss and opted to bat first.
Jos Buttler confirmed that Mark Wood would be in the playing XI over Reece Topley.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was concluded without a result due to rain.
Scotland's captain Richie Berrington hoped his side would progress as far as they could in the tournament.
England's skipper Jos Buttler stated everyone was excited to get going and would have bowled first anyway.
